News

August 15, 2025

I am joining Oakland University as an Assistant Professor. Please feel free to reach out to me if you want to collaborate or join my group.

May 15, 2024

Our work Simulated Misinformation Susceptibility (SMISTS): Enhancing Misinformation Research with Large Language Model Simulations is accepted to ACL Finding 2024. Congrats to all the co-authors!

January 12, 2024

Our work Deciphering Stereotypes in Pre-Trained Language Models published in the Proceedings of the 2023 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing appeared in Dartmouth news
